English: Review My Emails | Expert Email List Cleaning
Greek: Review My Emails | Επαγγελματικός Καθαρισμός Λίστας Email
Portuguese: Review My Emails | Limpeza Profissional de Lista de Email
French: Review My Emails | Nettoyage Expert de Liste Email
Spanish: Review My Emails | Limpieza Profesional de Listas de Email
Khmer: Review My Emails | សេវាសម្អាតបញ្ជីអ៊ីមែលដោយអ្នកជំនាញ

English: Expert email list cleaning services. Not automated validation — hands-on analysis that spots spam traps, risky contacts, and reputation killers.
Greek: Επαγγελματικές υπηρεσίες καθαρισμού λίστας email. Όχι αυτοματοποιημένο Validation - πρακτική ανάλυση που εντοπίζει spam traps, επικίνδυνες επαφές και παράγοντες που καταστρέφουν τη φήμη σας.
Portuguese: Serviços profissionais de limpeza de lista de email. Não é Validation automatizado - análise manual que identifica spam traps, contatos arriscados e problemas que prejudicam sua reputação.
French: Services experts de nettoyage de liste email. Pas de Validation automatisée - une analyse manuelle qui détecte les spam traps, contacts à risque et facteurs nuisibles à votre réputation.
Spanish: Servicios profesionales de limpieza de listas de email. No es Validation automatizado - análisis manual que detecta spam traps, contactos riesgosos y factores que dañan tu reputación.
German: Professionelle E-Mail-Listen-Bereinigung. Keine automatisierte Validation - praktische Analyse, die Spam-Traps, riskante Kontakte und Reputationskiller aufspürt.
Khmer: សេវាសម្អាតបញ្ជីអ៊ីមែលដោយអ្នកជំនាញ។ មិនមែន Validation ស្វ័យប្រវត្តិទេ - ការវិភាគដោយដៃដែលរកឃើញ spam traps ទំនាក់ទំនងប្រថុយ និងបញ្ហាដែលប៉ះពាល់កេរ្តិ៍ឈ្មោះរបស់អ្នក។
លើសពី Validation

English: Validation tools miss things. We don't.
Greek: Τα εργαλεία Validation χάνουν πράγματα. Εμείς όχι.
Portuguese: Ferramentas de Validation deixam passar coisas. Nós não.
French: Les outils de Validation ratent des choses. Pas nous.
Spanish: Las herramientas de Validation pasan cosas por alto. Nosotros no.
Khmer: ឧបករណ៍ Validation ខកខានរឿងជាច្រើន។ យើងមិនខកខានទេ។

English: What you'll get: A cleaned list labeled Keep, Monitor, or Suppress—plus the reasoning behind each one.
Greek: Τι θα λάβετε: Μια καθαρισμένη λίστα με ετικέτες Keep, Monitor ή Suppress—συν την αιτιολόγηση πίσω από κάθε μία.
Portuguese: O que você vai receber: Uma lista limpa rotulada Keep, Monitor ou Suppress—mais o raciocínio por trás de cada um.
French: Ce que vous obtiendrez : Une liste nettoyée étiquetée Keep, Monitor ou Suppress—plus le raisonnement derrière chacun.
Spanish: Lo que obtendrás: Una lista limpia etiquetada Keep, Monitor o Suppress—más el razonamiento detrás de cada uno.
German: Was Sie erhalten: Eine bereinigte Liste mit Keep, Monitor oder Suppress—plus die Begründung für jede Entscheidung.
Khmer: អ្វីដែលអ្នកនឹងទទួលបាន៖ បញ្ជីស្អាតដែលមានស្លាក Keep, Monitor ឬ Suppress—បូកនឹងហេតុផលនៅពីក្រោយនីមួយៗ។
សម្អាតបញ្ជីរបស់ខ្ញុំ
ធ្វើ Quiz ឥតគិតថ្លៃ

English: "I didn't realize how much of my list was dead weight until I saw the report."
Greek: "Δεν είχα συνειδητοποιήσει πόσο μέρος της λίστας μου ήταν νεκρό βάρος μέχρι που είδα την αναφορά."
Portuguese: "Eu não percebia quanto da minha lista era peso morto até ver o relatório."
French: "Je n'avais pas réalisé combien de ma liste était du poids mort jusqu'à ce que je voie le rapport."
Spanish: "No me di cuenta de cuánto de mi lista era peso muerto hasta que vi el informe."
German: "Ich habe nicht gemerkt, wie viel meiner Liste totes Gewicht war, bis ich den Bericht sah."
Khmer: "ខ្ញុំមិនដឹងថាបញ្ជីរបស់ខ្ញុំមានទម្ងន់ស្លាប់ប៉ុន្មានទេរហូតដល់ខ្ញុំបានឃើញរបាយការណ៍។"
— នាយកទីផ្សារ ក្រុមហ៊ុន SaaS

Greek: Γιατί τα εργαλεία Validation δεν αρκούν
Portuguese: Por que ferramentas de Validation não são suficientes
French: Pourquoi les outils de Validation ne suffisent pas
Spanish: Por qué las herramientas de Validation no son suficientes
Khmer: ហេតុអ្វីបានជាឧបករណ៍ Validation មិនគ្រប់គ្រាន់

English: Validation says an email exists. It doesn't say if it's a trap.
Greek: Το Validation λέει ότι ένα email υπάρχει. Δεν λέει αν είναι παγίδα.
Portuguese: Validation diz que um email existe. Não diz se é uma armadilha.
French: Validation dit qu'un email existe. Il ne dit pas si c'est un piège.
Spanish: Validation dice que un email existe. No dice si es una trampa.
German: Validation sagt, eine E-Mail existiert. Es sagt nicht, ob es eine Falle ist.
Khmer: Validation និយាយថាអ៊ីមែលមាន។ វាមិនប្រាប់ថាវាជាអន្ទាក់ទេ។

English: One tool says clean. Another says risky. You're still guessing.
Greek: Ένα εργαλείο λέει καθαρό. Ένα άλλο λέει επικίνδυνο. Ακόμα μαντεύετε.
Portuguese: Uma ferramenta diz limpo. Outra diz arriscado. Você ainda está adivinhando.
French: Un outil dit propre. Un autre dit risqué. Vous devinez encore.
Spanish: Una herramienta dice limpio. Otra dice riesgoso. Sigues adivinando.
German: Ein Tool sagt sauber. Ein anderes sagt riskant. Sie raten immer noch.
Khmer: ឧបករណ៍មួយនិយាយថាស្អាត។ មួយទៀតនិយាយថាប្រថុយ។ អ្នកនៅតែស្មាន។

English: Bounces drop. Deliverability tanks. The tool said it was fine.
Greek: Τα bounces πέφτουν. Το Deliverability καταρρέει. Το εργαλείο είπε ότι ήταν εντάξει.
Portuguese: Bounces caem. Deliverability despenca. A ferramenta disse que estava tudo bem.
French: Les bounces chutent. La Deliverability s'effondre. L'outil disait que c'était bon.
Spanish: Los bounces caen. Deliverability se hunde. La herramienta dijo que estaba bien.
German: Bounces sinken. Deliverability bricht ein. Das Tool sagte, es war in Ordnung.
Khmer: Bounces ធ្លាក់។ Deliverability ធ្លាក់ចុះ។ ឧបករណ៍និយាយថាវាល្អ។
របៀបដំណើរការ
ផ្ញើបញ្ជីរបស់អ្នក

English: CSV or Excel. Up to 500K addresses. Secure transfer included.
Greek: CSV ή Excel. Έως 500K διευθύνσεις. Ασφαλής μεταφορά περιλαμβάνεται.
Portuguese: CSV ou Excel. Até 500K endereços. Transferência segura incluída.
French: CSV ou Excel. Jusqu'à 500K adresses. Transfert sécurisé inclus.
Spanish: CSV o Excel. Hasta 500K direcciones. Transferencia segura incluida.
German: CSV oder Excel. Bis zu 500K Adressen. Sichere Übertragung inklusive.
Khmer: CSV ឬ Excel។ រហូតដល់ 500K អាសយដ្ឋាន។ ការផ្ទេរសុវត្ថិភាពរួមបញ្ចូល។
យើងពិនិត្យដោយដៃ

English: Pattern analysis. Trap detection. Reputation risk scoring. 24-48 hours.
Greek: Ανάλυση μοτίβων. Ανίχνευση παγίδων. Βαθμολόγηση κινδύνου φήμης. 24-48 ώρες.
Portuguese: Análise de padrões. Detecção de armadilhas. Pontuação de risco de reputação. 24-48 horas.
French: Analyse de motifs. Détection de pièges. Scoring de risque de réputation. 24-48 heures.
Spanish: Análisis de patrones. Detección de trampas. Puntuación de riesgo de reputación. 24-48 horas.
Khmer: ការវិភាគគំរូ។ ការរកឃើញអន្ទាក់។ ការវាយតម្លៃហានិភ័យកេរ្តិ៍ឈ្មោះ។ 24-48 ម៉ោង។
ទទួលបញ្ជីស្អាតរបស់អ្នក

English: Every address labeled. Full explanation report. 30-minute walkthrough call.
Greek: Κάθε διεύθυνση με ετικέτα. Πλήρης αναφορά εξήγησης. 30λεπτη κλήση επεξήγησης.
Portuguese: Cada endereço rotulado. Relatório de explicação completo. Chamada de 30 minutos de orientação.
French: Chaque adresse étiquetée. Rapport d'explication complet. Appel de présentation de 30 minutes.
Spanish: Cada dirección etiquetada. Informe de explicación completo. Llamada de orientación de 30 minutos.
German: Jede Adresse gekennzeichnet. Vollständiger Erklärungsbericht. 30-minütiger Durchsprech-Anruf.
Khmer: រាល់អាសយដ្ឋានមានស្លាក។ របាយការណ៍ពន្យល់ពេញលេញ។ ការហៅទូរសព្ទណែនាំ 30 នាទី។

Portuguese: O que você recebe de volta
Khmer: អ្វីដែលអ្នកទទួលបានមកវិញ
ស្លាកសកម្មភាពច្បាស់លាស់

English: Every email marked Keep, Monitor, or Suppress. No ambiguity.
Greek: Κάθε email με σήμανση Keep, Monitor ή Suppress. Χωρίς ασάφεια.
Portuguese: Cada email marcado Keep, Monitor ou Suppress. Sem ambiguidade.
French: Chaque email marqué Keep, Monitor ou Suppress. Pas d'ambiguïté.
Spanish: Cada email marcado Keep, Monitor o Suppress. Sin ambigüedad.
German: Jede E-Mail als Keep, Monitor oder Suppress markiert. Keine Unklarheit.
Khmer: រាល់អ៊ីមែលមានសម្គាល់ Keep, Monitor ឬ Suppress។ គ្មានភាពមិនច្បាស់។
ការបកស្រាយដោយអ្នកជំនាញ

English: Context on what it means for your reputation. Not just data—understanding.
Greek: Πλαίσιο για το τι σημαίνει για τη φήμη σας. Όχι απλά δεδομένα—κατανόηση.
Portuguese: Contexto sobre o que significa para sua reputação. Não apenas dados—compreensão.
French: Contexte sur ce que cela signifie pour votre réputation. Pas seulement des données—de la compréhension.
Spanish: Contexto sobre lo que significa para tu reputación. No solo datos—comprensión.
German: Kontext, was es für Ihre Reputation bedeutet. Nicht nur Daten—Verständnis.
Khmer: បរិបទអំពីអ្វីដែលវាមានន័យសម្រាប់កេរ្តិ៍ឈ្មោះរបស់អ្នក។ មិនមែនគ្រាន់តែទិន្នន័យទេ—ការយល់ដឹង។
ការហៅទូរសព្ទណែនាំ

English: 30-minute call to review findings and answer questions. Included in every order.
Greek: 30λεπτη κλήση για ανασκόπηση ευρημάτων και απαντήσεις σε ερωτήσεις. Περιλαμβάνεται σε κάθε παραγγελία.
Portuguese: Chamada de 30 minutos para revisar descobertas e responder perguntas. Incluída em cada pedido.
French: Appel de 30 minutes pour examiner les résultats et répondre aux questions. Inclus dans chaque commande.
Spanish: Llamada de 30 minutos para revisar hallazgos y responder preguntas. Incluida en cada pedido.
German: 30-minütiger Anruf zur Besprechung der Ergebnisse und Beantwortung von Fragen. Bei jeder Bestellung inklusive.
Khmer: ការហៅទូរសព្ទ 30 នាទីដើម្បីពិនិត្យលទ្ធផល និងឆ្លើយសំណួរ។ រួមបញ្ចូលក្នុងរាល់ការបញ្ជាទិញ។
នេះសម្រាប់អ្នកណា

English: You've tried validation tools. Still landing in spam.
Greek: Έχετε δοκιμάσει εργαλεία Validation. Ακόμα πέφτετε στο spam.
Portuguese: Você tentou ferramentas de Validation. Ainda caindo no spam.
French: Vous avez essayé les outils de Validation. Toujours en spam.
Spanish: Has probado herramientas de Validation. Sigues cayendo en spam.
German: Sie haben Validation-Tools ausprobiert. Landen immer noch im Spam.
Khmer: អ្នកបានសាកល្បងឧបករណ៍ Validation។ នៅតែធ្លាក់ក្នុង spam។

English: You inherited a list with unknown quality.
Greek: Κληρονομήσατε μια λίστα με άγνωστη ποιότητα.
Portuguese: Você herdou uma lista com qualidade desconhecida.
French: Vous avez hérité d'une liste de qualité inconnue.
Spanish: Heredaste una lista con calidad desconocida.
German: Sie haben eine Liste mit unbekannter Qualität geerbt.
Khmer: អ្នកបានទទួលមរតកបញ្ជីដែលមានគុណភាពមិនស្គាល់។

English: You're migrating ESPs and need to clean house.
Greek: Μεταβαίνετε σε νέο ESP και πρέπει να καθαρίσετε.
Portuguese: Você está migrando ESPs e precisa fazer uma limpeza.
French: Vous migrez d'ESP et devez faire le ménage.
Spanish: Estás migrando ESPs y necesitas limpiar.
German: Sie migrieren ESPs und müssen aufräumen.
Khmer: អ្នកកំពុងផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ESP ហើយត្រូវសម្អាត។

English: You want expert eyes, not another automated report.
Greek: Θέλετε ματιά ειδικού, όχι άλλη αυτοματοποιημένη αναφορά.
Portuguese: Você quer olhos de especialista, não outro relatório automatizado.
French: Vous voulez des yeux d'expert, pas un autre rapport automatisé.
Spanish: Quieres ojos expertos, no otro informe automatizado.
German: Sie wollen Expertenaugen, nicht einen weiteren automatisierten Bericht.
Khmer: អ្នកចង់បានភ្នែកអ្នកជំនាញ មិនមែនរបាយការណ៍ស្វ័យប្រវត្តិមួយទៀតទេ។
របៀបវិបត្តិ

Greek: Στη blocklist; Προειδοποίηση ESP; Η φήμη καταρρέει;
Portuguese: Na blocklist? Aviso do ESP? Reputação despencando?
French: Sur une blocklist? Avertissement ESP? Réputation en chute?
German: Auf der Blocklist? ESP-Warnung? Reputation im Keller?
Khmer: នៅក្នុង blocklist? ការព្រមានពី ESP? កេរ្តិ៍ឈ្មោះធ្លាក់ចុះ?

English: The SOS Hotline gives you free, immediate guidance when deliverability breaks.
Greek: Το SOS Hotline σας δίνει δωρεάν, άμεση καθοδήγηση όταν το Deliverability χαλάει.
Portuguese: O SOS Hotline oferece orientação gratuita e imediata quando o Deliverability quebra.
French: La SOS Hotline vous donne des conseils gratuits et immédiats quand la Deliverability casse.
Spanish: El SOS Hotline te da orientación gratuita e inmediata cuando Deliverability falla.
German: Die SOS Hotline gibt Ihnen kostenlose, sofortige Anleitung, wenn Deliverability versagt.
Khmer: SOS Hotline ផ្តល់ការណែនាំឥតគិតថ្លៃភ្លាមៗនៅពេល Deliverability បរាជ័យ។
ទទួលជំនួយបន្ទាន់

English: Ready to see what's really in your list?
Greek: Έτοιμοι να δείτε τι πραγματικά υπάρχει στη λίστα σας;
Portuguese: Pronto para ver o que realmente está na sua lista?
French: Prêt à voir ce qu'il y a vraiment dans votre liste?
Spanish: ¿Listo para ver qué hay realmente en tu lista?
German: Bereit zu sehen, was wirklich in Ihrer Liste ist?

English: Something went wrong. Please try again.
Greek: Κάτι πήγε στραβά. Παρακαλώ δοκιμάστε ξανά.
Portuguese: Algo deu errado. Por favor, tente novamente.
